application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 21 (Confirmation of mains water consumption), of Variation of Conditions application reference  24/1510 dated 17th October 2024 for Variation of condition 2, development built in accordance with approved drawings (reconfigure the wrap-around balconies and alteration of glazed corner to solid column to north block/site) of Variation of Conditions reference 22/3089 dated 31 March, 2023, for Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings and documents) and condition 3 (wheelchair accessible units), of full Planning Permission reference 13/2213 dated 16 May 2017, for demolition of buildings within 205 and 235 Church Road, and redevelopment of section of Church End car park site to the rear of 207-233(odds inc.) Church Road to erect a part 2,3,4,5 and 6-storey building containing 65 residential units, 298m2 (GEA) retail floorspace, together with 7 car parking spaces and associated works as revised by plans and details and subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 5 May 2017 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended.
site_name: 205-211 ODDS Inc, 235 & Land in Church Road Car Park rear of 205-235 Church Road, London, NW10
